post.author: 김승엽
post.content:
I have the same problem.
But I have no idea how to find the value name you mentioned below.
Please help me out!

>Try this.
>
>System Key: [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\\\SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\Windows NT\\\\CurrentVersion\\\\Winlogon]
>Value Name: PowerdownAfterShutdown
>Data Type: REG_SZ (String Value)
>Value Data: (0 = default, 1 = power down)
>
>
>Change the value to 1 to power down after shutdown.
>
>If your PC has ACPI board the computer should power off even if the value is set to 0, but you have to manually set it if not.  Please let me know if this doesn't work.  Thanks.
>
>
>>누구 도움좀 주세요.
>>Shut Down을 해도 하드디스크는 Power off가 되질 않아서 매번 손으로 꺼야
>>합니다. 무엇이 문제인가요.
>
post.title: [re] [질문] Win2000 - How to Auto Power off?
